level.heading: Business transactions of partner with partnership.
level.text: A partner may lend money to and do other business with the limited partnership and has the same rights and obligations with respect to the loan or other transaction as a person that is not a partner.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 redesignated former § 29-701.09 as § 29-701.11.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 112 of the Uniform Limited Partnership Act (2001 Act).
Section 2(g)(2)(F) of D.C. Law 19-210 redesignated former § 20-701.11 as § 29-701.13.
Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
